description: Granular policy that restricts agent actions to only the affected service

NORMAL.rationale: Monitor only - no system changes allowed

EMERGENCY.description: Emergency mode - fix ONLY the broken service

service_restrictions.rule: Can only modify services that are currently unhealthy

EMERGENCY.rationale: Fix only what's broken - healthy services remain untouched

service_targeting.description: Actions must target only unhealthy services
service_targeting.enforcement: Agent must check service health before any modification
